title: Professional Hair Salon Nylon Cape with Snap Closure - 50" x 60"
description: This premium, individually-packaged cape is made with superior attention to detail. It includes a sewn-in loop to hang the cape when not in use, as well as an adjustable snap closure that fits necks from 12" to 23" in circumference. Cape is 100% brand new, first-run production, and is made of top-grade, durable, black nylon for premium comfort. It is lightweight, soft, stain- and water-resistant, and features thinly hemmed edges. Cape measures approximately 50" by 60" when laying flat. Reusable; can be wiped clean, machine-washed warm, or dry-cleaned.

title: Diane Rake/Rage Comb Bone/Black, 12 Count
description: Wide tooth rake comb. Extra long teeth. Specially made with 100% natural boar bristle and varnished dark wood handle. It features a soft bristles on one side and firm bristles on the other, making it top-in-the line in men’s brushes.

title: [Magic Collection] 21" Extra Large Elastic Band Satin Sleeping Cap - Black
description: XL Black Satin Sleep Cap.  Breathable & Comfortable Material with Comfortable Elastic Band.  Keeps Hair In Place.  X-Large 21" Full Size For The Perfect Fit.  Use with Rollers or Large styles.
